message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,250,000. It's a great deal, and I believe it's worth every penny. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,150,000. I'm very interested in the product, but I have a limited budget. Can you meet me in the middle?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still confident in the value of this product.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $1,200,000, which is the minimum I can accept.  Let's work together to make this happen.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,200,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,150,000. Can you meet me at this price?
